title: Enhancing Nursing Practice Competency: Participatory Learning Design for Strengthening Digital Multimodal Composition Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency, foundational L2 language proficiency
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design digital works integrating multimodal components (text, images, audio, video)
Learners can analyze the effectiveness of multimodal works through peer and self-assessment
Learners can apply multimodal reading and writing strategies that meet the demands of the digital age
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
